H0.text: who is the governor of pennsylvania state now. Josh Shapiro

H2.text: who is the governor of pennsylvania state now. Ed Rendell

H3.text: who is the governor of pennsylvania state now. Tom Corbett

A4.text: Joshua David Shapiro (born June 20, 1973) is an American politician and lawyer serving since 2023 as the 48th governor of Pennsylvania.

A5.text: On January 17, 2023, Shapiro was sworn in on a stack of three Hebrew Bibles, including one that was on the bimah during the Pittsburgh synagogue shooting.
